Title: Requires hospitals and residential health care facilities to have a three-month supply of personal protective equipment in stock on the premises
Summary: Requires hospitals and residential health care facilities to have a three-month supply of personal protective equipment in stock on the premises; requires the department of health to conduct an annual audit of the availability of such personal protective equipment in hospitals and residential health care facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803, add ยง2801-i, Pub Health L
